page.discussion: The <TBL>.DECRYPT() method decrypts the table referenced by the object pointer, <TBL>. The Result_Flag is .T. (TRUE) if the operation is successful. Alpha Anywhere requires exclusive access to the table in order to decrypt it.

section.title: Example
section.example: default_encryption_key_set("swordfish") 'because the default key was set, do not have to supply password for the table.open() method t = table.open("customer") t.decrypt() t.close()
